related.meaning: highway (esp. one existing from the Edo period)

lessons.japanese: 彼は街頭で買った絵を額縁に入れた。
lessons.english: He framed the picture he had bought on the street.

lessons.japanese: 候補者たちは街頭に出て、せっせと愛想を振りまいています。
lessons.english: The candidates are out kissing babies and pumping hands.

lessons.japanese: 警察は街頭デモを阻止しようとした。
lessons.english: The police tried to stop the street demonstration.
